text: @FredTJoseph Everyone of us has been at this for days & weeks. Just hoping you can see me now. Living out of a motel just had to be tested for covid19 bf cant start his new job bc he has to quarantine w/ me until results are back. I need this #RENTRELIEF $reebamitch 🙏💙 @GovernorTomWolf
